#summary Nice HTML tables

= htmlTable() view helper =

You can use it like this in your view script:

{{{
<?=$this->htmlTable()
	->hideColumn('id')
	->setColumnTitle('authorEmail', 'author')

	->setParser('text', create_function('$value', 'return substr($value, 0, 250)."...";'))
	->addColumnStyle('text', "width: 250px;")
	->setParser('created', create_function('$value', 'return date("d/m/y", strtotime($value));'))

	->addOption('approve', 'id', 'id', array('controller'=>'moderate', 'action'=>'approve'))
	->skipOption('approve', create_function('$row', 'return $row->isApproved();'))
	
	->setPaginator($this->paginator)
	?>
}}}
